sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CATBPIWI( PIWI_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), PIWI_PART_NO VARCHAR(20), PIWI_EONO VARCHAR(20), PIWI_CUMT_NO NUMBER(10, 0), PIWI_MATL_CORP VARCHAR(4), PIWI_MATL_STND CHAR(1), PIWI_MATL_CODE VARCHAR(16), PIWI_MATL_APDT CHAR(8), PIWI_MATL_GUBN CHAR(3), PIWI_MATL_YN CHAR(1), PIWI_GRVT_NUMB NUMBER(7, 4), PIWI_COIL_WIDT NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_COIL_PITC NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_COIL_THIK NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_MATT_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_MATT_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_SHAP_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_SHAP_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_PROD_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_PROD_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_SQUA_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_SQUA_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_AFTR_DIA0 NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_AFTR_THIK NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_NET0_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_NET0_WEGT NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_BEND_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_BEND_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_ANGL_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_ANGL_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_BEND_PONT NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_SHRT_X NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_LONG_Y NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_LONG_RADI NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_LONG_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_SPAR_LEN1 NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_SPAR_LEN2 NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_BEND_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_CUT2_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_CUT2_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_BELL_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_BELL_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_EXRE_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_REDU_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_PIER_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_SIZE_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_CHAM_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_ROLL_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_ENDF_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_BURR_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_BRUS_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_LEAK_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), PIWI_EXPN_GUBN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_EXPN_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_DOIL_YN CHAR(1), PIWI_INPT_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_INPT_WEGT NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), PIWI_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_CNCB_CODE VARCHAR(8), PIWI_MAKE_YN CHAR(1), PIWI_BEFR_DIA0 NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_BEFR_THIK NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_WELD_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), PIWI_HOLE_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0), CONSTRAINT CATBPIWI_PK PRIMARY KEY ( PIWI_CORP_CODE, PIWI_PART_NO, PIWI_EONO, PIWI_CUMT_NO ) )
